content:
• Wednesday, July 13, 2011
  • MAR

    Marriott (NYSE:MAR) now down 3.7% AH after reporting profits that met expectations, but lighter...

    Marriott (NYSE:MAR) now down 3.7% AH after reporting profits that met expectations, but lighter sales and some weak guidance: full-year EPS of $1.35-$1.43, vs. an expected $1.42. Starwood (HOT) down 1.8% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:52 PM
  • YUM

    More on YUM: The story is - what else - China, where 25% growth in operating profit offset a...

    More on YUM: The story is - what else - China, where 25% growth in operating profit offset a sharp decline in U.S. earnings. The company also raised its guidance 12% for 2011, expecting profits of $2.83/share. (previous)

     
     
     
     
    | 4:25 PM
  • MSFT

    LinkedIn (LNKD) gained 8.4% today, two days after comScore reported the company had passed...

    LinkedIn (LNKD) gained 8.4% today, two days after comScore reported the company had passed MySpace to become America's second-largest social network in terms of unique visitors. Shares are now up 19% from their 7/5 close, and 79.3% from their 6/20 low.
     
     
     
     
    | 4:23 PM
  • EQC

    Commercial real estate trust CommonWealth REIT (NYSE:CWH) is down 5.5% to $24.01 after proposing...

    Commercial real estate trust CommonWealth REIT (NYSE:CWH) is down 5.5% to $24.01 after proposing a 7.5M share offering, and pricing a 10M share offering at $24. CommonWealth, which has over $3B in long-term debt, plans on using the proceeds to repay debts from its credit facility, and to fund acquisitions.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:33 PM
  • TUES

    Tuesday Morning (TUES -8.5%) hits new lows for the day after saying Q4 sales were lower than...

    Tuesday Morning (TUES -8.5%) hits new lows for the day after saying Q4 sales were lower than expectations, down 3% YoY at $194.8M. The company cut its Q4 EPS outlook to a loss of $0.03 to $0.05, vs. a profit a year ago.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:46 PM
  • PAET

    Broadband provider PAETEC (PAET +4%) trades higher after RBC upgraded the stock to outperform,...

    Broadband provider PAETEC (PAET +4%) trades higher after RBC upgraded the stock to outperform, citing improving demand for the company's IP-based services, coupled with anticipated EBITDA margin expansion.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:30 PM
  • BRFS

    ADRs in frozen-products leader Brasil Foods (NYSE:BRFS) have jumped 10% today after a...

    ADRs in frozen-products leader Brasil Foods (NYSE:BRFS) have jumped 10% today after a conditional OK of its $3.8B plan to take over rival Sadia. A 4-1 vote requires that BRFS suspend its use of Perdigao, a brand valued at nearly $2B, and the company says that and other divestitures will hit 13% of operating revenue.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:27 PM
  • NYX

    A few hours before the deadline, Deutsche Boerse (DBOEY.PK +4%) says some 60% of shares favor...

    A few hours before the deadline, Deutsche Boerse (DBOEY.PK +4%) says some 60% of shares favor its merger with NYSE Euronext (NYX +2.2%) - up from Tuesday's 34.5%, and likely to hit the 75% threshold by 5 p.m. EDT. With a fourth malfunction this month, NYX may be ready to take on some new technology. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 2:02 PM
  • CPX

    Complete Production Services (CPX +6.5%) pops on an upgrade from Broker Hunter. The firm says...

    Complete Production Services (CPX +6.5%) pops on an upgrade from Broker Hunter. The firm says delays on the company's Eagle Ford project were minor, and weather issues that plagued the previous quarter are no longer a factor. From a valuation basis, the stock is too attractive to ignore.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:05 PM
  • AMZN

    Shares of Whole Foods Market (WFM +3.8%) gain, bolstered with a Buy rating from TheStreet...

    Shares of Whole Foods Market (WFM +3.8%) gain, bolstered with a Buy rating from TheStreet Ratings on top of Goldman's earlier upgrade this week. Shares trade at a 52-week high.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:02 PM
  • MAR

    Marriott (MAR +1.9%) holds on to gains from a Baird valuation upgrade ahead of today's Q2...

    Marriott (MAR +1.9%) holds on to gains from a Baird valuation upgrade ahead of today's Q2 earnings after the close. The firm says the stock is a good buy "for long-term oriented investors looking for exposure to improving hotel fundamentals."

     
     
     
     
    | 12:14 PM
  • ITG

    Investment Technology Group (ITG -14.4%) continues to sink after announcing earlier it will miss...

    Investment Technology Group (ITG -14.4%) continues to sink after announcing earlier it will miss Q2 estimates, as the company struggles with revenue capture due to changes in product and client mix. It now expects EPS for the quarter to come in between $0.12 and $0.15, lower than the consensus estimate of $0.20.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:58 AM
  • NFLX

    Through Jeffries is cautious about Netflix's (NFLX +2.6%) price hike, Goldman and Piper Jaffray...

    Through Jeffries is cautious about Netflix's (NFLX +2.6%) price hike, Goldman and Piper Jaffray are reiterating their Buy and Overweight ratings, respectively. Goldman believes the revenue and margin boost from higher prices will offset any churn increase, while Piper expects growth in streaming-only subscriptions to increase profitability.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:54 AM
  • NYT

    The NYT will pay off $250M owed to Carlos Slim about 5 months ahead of its due date. The note...

    The NYT will pay off $250M owed to Carlos Slim about 5 months ahead of its due date. The note carries a 14.05% interest rate. Shares +2.9%.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:44 AM
  • GLUU

    Glu Mobile (GLUU +12.3%) gets a boost from Electronic Arts buying PopCap. As one of just a...

    Glu Mobile (GLUU +12.3%) gets a boost from Electronic Arts buying PopCap. As one of just a handful of casual game makers for the iOS, Android, Palm and Windows Phone 7, the company is considered to be a healthy acquisition target as the gaming market on mobile phones and tablets continues to grow.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:32 AM
  • OUTR

    Coinstar (CSTR +3.8%) shares surge, as its Redbox DVD kiosks could be big winners from Netflix's...

    Coinstar (CSTR +3.8%) shares surge, as its Redbox DVD kiosks could be big winners from Netflix's (NFLX +2.8%) controversial plan to separate its DVD and streaming subscription deals. Outraged customers could downgrade to Netflix's $7.99/month streaming-only plan and then rent individual DVDs from Redbox kiosks at $1/night, Merriman writes.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:07 AM | 2 Comments
  • CALX

    Broadband infrastructure equipment firm Calix (CALX +5.2%) is nearing its 52-week high following...

    Broadband infrastructure equipment firm Calix (CALX +5.2%) is nearing its 52-week high following an announcement that rural telcos CimTel and Cross will be using Calix's Ethernet and optical networking gear in their fiber network rollouts.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:03 AM
  • PBTH

    PROLOR Biotech (NYSEMKT:PBTH) pops today, +11.3% to $5.61, after yesterday's initiation of...

    PROLOR Biotech (NYSEMKT:PBTH) pops today, +11.3% to $5.61, after yesterday's initiation of coverage by Morgan Joseph at Buy with a target of $16. Also this week, Summer Street initiated coverage with a target of $8. The company develops therapeutic proteins and has full Phase II trial results ahead.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:57 AM
  • SSRI

    Silver (SLV +5.1%) gains on more reports stockpiles lag global demand, and hints from FOMC...

    Silver (SLV +5.1%) gains on more reports stockpiles lag global demand, and hints from FOMC minutes - coupled with Bernanke's comments today - suggesting another round of quantitative easing is still on the table. Gainers: Silver Standard (SSRI +6.4%), Endeavor Silver (EXK +5.3%), Silvercorp Metals (SVM +7.9%), Silver Wheaton (SLW +7.2%).

     
     
     
     
    | 10:52 AM
  • SINA

    In a push to monetize its platform, Sina (SINA +5.1%) plans to launch a virtual currency for its...

    In a push to monetize its platform, Sina (SINA +5.1%) plans to launch a virtual currency for its microblogging site, Weibo. The currency, called Weibi, will allow users to buy small, inexpensive virtual trinkets for themselves or friends. With over 140M users, market insiders are saying the move really is a "no-brainer."
     
     
     
     
    | 10:36 AM | 1 Comment
  • AVID

    Brigantine Advisors' Barbara Coffey sees an opportunity for Avid Technology (AVID +4.4%) to...

    Brigantine Advisors' Barbara Coffey sees an opportunity for Avid Technology (AVID +4.4%) to profit from the uproar over Apple's (NASDAQ:AAPL) Final Cut Pro X. As a result, Coffey is upgrading Avid to Buy, and lifting her FY11 EPS and revenue estimates. Adobe (NASDAQ:ADBE) is already offering promotions to take advantage of the Apple backlash.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:31 AM
  • PRTK

    Transcept Pharmaceuticals (TSPT -40.6%) shares plummet after the company says it expects to...

    Transcept Pharmaceuticals (TSPT -40.6%) shares plummet after the company says it expects to receive a rejection letter from the FDA concerning its new drug application for insomnia treatment Intermezzo. The agency expressed concerns about the safety of the drug during a Tuesday conference call, the company says.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:08 AM
  • MGM

    Casino operator MGM Resorts (MGM +2.4%) trades higher on an upgrade from KeyBanc. The firm says...

    Casino operator MGM Resorts (MGM +2.4%) trades higher on an upgrade from KeyBanc. The firm says the Macau casino market continues to be strong, with overall market growth for the year-to-date surpassing expectations.
     
     
     
     
    | 9:46 AM
  • NFLX

    JPMorgan says internet companies will experience double-digit growth in coming years, as the...

    JPMorgan says internet companies will experience double-digit growth in coming years, as the monetization of new online video content, virtual goods, applications and cloud-based services bolsters the industry. The firm initiates coverage of five Internet stocks: Netflix (NFLX +2.5%), Amazon (AMZN +1.4%) and Google (NASDAQ:GOOG) are started at overweight, with Yahoo (YHOO) and eBay (NASDAQ:EBAY) at neutral.
     
     
     
     
    | 9:12 AM | 3 Comments
  • LDK

    LDK Solar (NYSE:LDK), which has been hammered recently along with many other solar names, is up...

    LDK Solar (NYSE:LDK), which has been hammered recently along with many other solar names, is up 2.4% premarket after announcing the signing of supply agreements with two Chinese power companies.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:05 AM
  • TRH

    Shares of Transatlantic Holdings (NYSE:TRH) up 6.3% premarket after last night's announcement of...

    Shares of Transatlantic Holdings (NYSE:TRH) up 6.3% premarket after last night's announcement of a $3.5B buyout from Validus (NYSE:VR). The firm says its board will evaluate the offer. Shares of Validus -5.1% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:01 AM
  • GLUU

    Premarket gainers: GLUU +10%. HRBN +9%. CLNE +8%. MDW +6%. TRH +6%. KCI +5%. DANG +5%. RENN +4%....

    Premarket gainers: GLUU +10%. HRBN +9%. CLNE +8%. MDW +6%. TRH +6%. KCI +5%. DANG +5%. RENN +4%. NXG +3%. SINA +3%. XCO +3%. YOKU +3%.
    Losers: CWH -6%. NOK -3%. SOLR -3%.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:00 AM
  • AAPL

    Looking at a "refresh of virtually every product line between July and October," Apple...

    Looking at a "refresh of virtually every product line between July and October," Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) is strongly positioned for the peak holiday selling season, and its stock - already starting to tick higher - will benefit, Citi's Rich Gardner writes. iPhone demand has been strong this quarter, he adds, raising his sales estimate to 16-18M units, above 16.5-17M consensus. AAPL +1% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:54 AM
  • BIDU

    China's GDP report helps lift shares of Baidu (NASDAQ:BIDU) up 2.2% premarket, adding to...

    China's GDP report helps lift shares of Baidu (NASDAQ:BIDU) up 2.2% premarket, adding to positive sentiment from an analyst report from Piper reiterating an Overweight rating and $181 price target.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:47 AM

  • Gold futures are now trading at record levels due to ongoing fears over eurozone debt problems,...

    Gold futures are now trading at record levels due to ongoing fears over eurozone debt problems, with the current settlement price for short-term contracts easily surpassing the record set on May 2. However, adjusted for inflation, gold is still below its Jan. 1980 high.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:31 AM | 4 Comments
  • CLNE

    Clean Energy Fuels (NASDAQ:CLNE) is adding to yesterday's gains in premarket trading, with...

    Clean Energy Fuels (NASDAQ:CLNE) is adding to yesterday's gains in premarket trading, with shares up 7.3% as Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) upgrades the company to Buy from Sell following its $150M bond investment from Chesapeake Energy (NYSE:CHK).

     
     
     
     
    | 8:23 AM
  • ASML

    Shares of ASML (NASDAQ:ASML) -1.5% premarket on high volume after warning weak consumer demand...

    Shares of ASML (NASDAQ:ASML) -1.5% premarket on high volume after warning weak consumer demand for mobile phones and laptops will hurt sales. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 8:19 AM
  • XCO

    Stifel Nicolaus boosts Exco Resources (NYSE:XCO) to Buy from Hold with a $19 price target,...

    Stifel Nicolaus boosts Exco Resources (NYSE:XCO) to Buy from Hold with a $19 price target, pointing to a higher production outlook for 2012-2015. Shares +2.8% to $16.18.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:09 AM
